text: William Desmond Taylor (born William Cunningham Deane-Tanner; 26 April 1872 - 1 February 1922) was an Irish director and actor. He was a popular person in the growing Hollywood motion picture business of the 1910s and early 1920s. He directed 59 silent movies between 1914 and 1922 and acted in 27 between 1913 and 1915. Taylor was shot and killed by an unknown suspect on 1 February 1922 at his Los Angeles home.Taylorology (newsheet), September 2003; retrieved 6 January 2008. The murder remains an official cold case (unsolved).Taylorology (newsheet) Issue 4, April 1993; retrieved 12 May 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1872 births Category:1922 deaths Category:Murder in California Category:Murder victims Category:Deaths by firearm in the United States Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish movie directors Category:Irish movie producers Category:Irish crime victims Category:Unsolved deaths
title: William Desmond Taylor
